![](https://hostlease.com/hl.png "")

What is HostLease?
All web hosting services are provided by Host Leasing Company (HostLease Media Group EU). Our company focuses on providing a wide range of professional services in the following areas: web hosting, reseller hosting, master reseller hosting. vps hosting and Dedicated Hosting, also domain registration and high-quality customer support. We offer services in 3 geographical locations (Europe - France, Roubaix, Luxembourg, Luxembourg and the Netherlands, Lelystad), so you can choose the best location for your company.

Our mission
It may sound incredible, but the majority of large web hosting companies do not usually invest much in the development of new technologies. Instead, they rely on third-party solutions and software. In contrast to ours, our hosting software is made, developed and designed in-house. Moreover, our business approach is people-oriented, because our customer support is a central factor in the high-quality hosting service we offer.

What does our customers' satisfaction look like?
Our turnkey solutions greatly appreciate our customers and they are also satisfied with our services. Our team helps the customer as best we can. We also continue to improve our services continuously with the feedback from our customers. This keeps us at the top of the friendliest customer service. That is also our goal to get the customers the highest satisfaction.


Exclusive for the LET community. If you already have a website with another provider, we'll help you move it to HostLease for free. Or start your own website today, for one low price.

Features include:

- LiteSpeed Web Server - blistering fast website performance
- Softaculous Auto-Installer - install up to 360 different scripts within a few clicks
- CloudLinux - all servers are running CloudLinux providing you with the stability and security you need
- KernelCare - all servers are running KernelCare, your website will never be offline during kernel updates or system maintenances!
- DDoS protected - all hosting servers are now DDoS protected, attacks will not take your website down!
- Free Website Migration - we will migrate from your old cPanel web hosting provider at no charge

Reseller Hosting
--------------
Create your own online business and sell hosting to your clients in your brand name with our most affordable and quality guaranteed reseller hosting plans. With our most affordable plans, you will be able to re-sell hosting and generate a monthly income based on your clients. You are free to set your own pricing and create your own plans.

Features Included
---------------
- LiteSpeed Web Server - blistering fast website performance
- Softaculous Auto-Installer - install up to 400+ different scripts within a few clicks
- CloudLinux - all servers are running CloudLinux providing you with the stability and security you need
- KernelCare - all servers are running KernelCare, your website will never be offline during kernel updates or system maintenances!
- DDoS protected - all resellers and master reseller hosting servers are DDoS protected upto 980Gbps
- 5x Kingston SSD Drive's - 45x faster as a HDD.
- (NEW! Templates for free for you as reseller to start WHMCS supported.)
- Reseller Plugin WHMAMP - This tool allows you to create resellers, suspend, remove, change specs and more.
